survey_name: Sustainable Office Practices Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding sustainable practices in the workplace, identifying areas of success and opportunities for improvement.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Consider adding a brief definition of sustainability initiatives if needed.

script.question_text: How aware are you of your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your workplace currently implement? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure 'None of the above' is mutually exclusive if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your workplace currently implement? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainability practices in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainability practices in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in workplace sustainability programs if they were offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in workplace sustainability programs if they were offered?
